The location of the Observatorium is Traveling to Dread Conquest might be a matter of step- unknown, perhaps even to the deities. ping into a long-deserted torture chamber during the autumn equinox, and perhaps demons from Lurking Fear WINDING ROAD invade the Material Plane from a particular haunted COSMOLOGY graveyard during every summer solstice. In this variant cosmology, the Universe is not a Great FEATURES OF THE ORRERY COSMOLOGY Wheel but rather a road with no beginning or end. Each The physical nature of this cosmology, more than any plane abuts the next, spiraling endlessly through the other, has a deep effect on the natives of the Material Astral Plane. Travelers move from plane to plane along Plane. In addition to particular elements favoring par- this road, passing through a multitude of planes. ticular seasons, the four Outer Planes also affect the fes- Within the Winding Road cosmology, the definition tivals throughout the year. These four great festivals of whether a plane is a Material Plane, Outer Plane, or dominate the lives of the inhabitants of the Material Inner Plane breaks down. Instead, each plane has its Plane; the name of each festival is taken from the name own traits that may indicate it is one type or another. of the appropriate Outer Plane. Gods tend to live on planes with the divinely morphic The winter solstice, when the Golden Halls is domi- trait, for example, but those planes aren’t Outer Planes, nant, is called Gold and is a time of gift-giving and cele- just further steps on the Winding Road. Unlike the bration. Archons are seen in holy places, and a feeling of D&D cosmology, there is no central plane. The Material good will settles over everyone. Wild things and evil Plane that most travelers are familiar with is just one beings lay low during this period. more stop along an endless ribbon. The spring equinox, when God’s Choice is dominant, is called Choice and is a time of tricks and pranks, of merry WINDING ROAD PLANAR RELATIONS celebrations, and of making decisions for the coming Each plane borders two other planes, as well as the Astral year as well as planting. Plane and the Plane of Shadow. Each plane has its own The summer solstice, when Lurking Fear is dominant, Ethereal Plane, but the Ethereal Planes of two different is called Fear. Its warm nights are when men and women planes don’t connect. Ethereal curtains allow a character keep to their homes for fear of the wild things that hide to step from an Ethereal Plane to the next plane on the in the darkness. Hunting horns blown by inhuman lips Winding Road, however. sound over the fields during this festival, and most civi- The two planes on either “side” of a plane may be simi- lized races keep to the safety of the cities. lar or radically different. There is no apparent order to the The autumn equinox, when Dread Conquest stalks planar traits on the Winding Road. the land, is called Dread and is a time of preparation. A single Plane of Shadow extends along the Road, con- Communities make sure the harvest will be sufficient necting each plane like beads on a string. Also called the to see them through winter, that walls are stout enough Dark Road, the Plane of Shadow allows travelers to move to withstand invasion, and that family and neighbors to adjacent planes if they are willing to brave the wild are healthy enough for the dark months ahead. It is a dark lands between them. somber festival marked by hard work, a time of judg- There is a single Astral Plane that allows movement to ment and vengeance, when one’s sins are evaluated and any plane along the Winding Road with astral projection blame assigned. andplane shift. But permanent portals only connect to adjacent planes; there are no shortcuts. There are no Elemental or Energy Planes on the Wind- ing Road, though the elements and energies still exist. WINDING ROAD TRAITS The traits for the Transitive Planes are the same as their D&D cosmology counterparts. You can choose traits for other planes along the Winding Road or roll them randomly on the tables below.
